text: Mixe may refer to: * Mixe people, an ethnic group of Oaxaca, Mexica * Mixe languages, the group of languages spoken by them * Sierra Mixe, a district in Oaxaca, Mexico * Roman Catholic Territorial Prelature of Mixes, in Oaxaca, Mexico * Lit-et-Mixe, a commune in Nouvelle-Aquitaine * , a historic region of the French Basque Country, which includes the present-day communes of Aïcirits-Camou-Suhast and Uhart-Mixe
title: Mixe
